value.title: You will love this robot
value.excerpt: Murderbot is hardly unique. Security droids like him accompany exploratory teams on missions all the time. However, Murderbot has a secret. value.title: Autonomous synthesis robot uses AI to speed up chemical discovery
value.excerpt: Chemists have developed an autonomous chemical synthesis robot with an integrated AI-driven machine learning unit. Dubbed 'RoboChem', the benchtop device can outperform a human chemist in terms of speed and accuracy while also displaying a high level of ingenuity.
